definition: trial marriage/to live together before deciding whether to marry

sentences.english: Another scene about love is the trial marriage of Xiaoxiao and Qin Fen.
sentences.chinese: 另一個愛情故事是笑笑和秦奮的試婚。

sentences.english: Shihun was mentioned in the Dunhuang document from Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 試婚在中國唐時敦煌文獻中有側面的記載。

sentences.english: Still, I believe that many Chinese still find it hard to accept this idea.
sentences.chinese: 但是我相信，很多中國人還是不接受試婚這一概念的。

definition: to undermine/to let someone down/to seduce someone away from something
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to come out of the closet/to reveal one's sexual orientation
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
lit. one palm alone cannot clap (proverb)/fig. it takes two persons to start a dispute/it takes two to tango/it's difficult to achieve anything without support
pinyin: yi1 ge5 ba1 zhang3 pai1 bu4 xiang3

definition: (Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
